--- grant_select_on_view.sql
GRANT SELECT ON VIEW singernames TO ROLE hr_manager
--- AST
&ast.Grant{
  Grant:     0,
  Privilege: &ast.SelectPrivilegeOnView{
    Select: 6,
    Names:  []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 32,
        Name:    "singernames",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 41,
      NameEnd: 51,
      Name:    "hr_manager",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRANT SELECT ON VIEW singernames TO ROLE hr_manager
